languages.text: "Я надеюсь, что их присутствие в Просторе ограничено только тем кораблем. И даже если это так... я уже отправил сообщение Лорд-инквизитору. Ордос выделит ресурсы на исследование проблемы".
"I hope their presence in the Expanse is limited to that ship. Even if it is, I have already dispatched a message to the Lord Inquisitor. The Ordo will allocate resources to investigate the matter."
languages.original_text: "Я надеюсь, что их присутствие в Просторе ограничено только тем кораблем. И даже если это так... я уже отправил сообщение Лорд-инквизитору. Ордос выделит ресурсы на исследование проблемы".

languages.text: “我希望，整个科罗努斯扩区只有那艘船上存在这样的异形。但即便真是如此，我也已经把这个情况传达给了大审判官。审判庭会分配资源，调查此事。”
languages.original_text: "I hope their presence in the Expanse is limited to that ship. Even if it is, I have already dispatched a message to the Lord Inquisitor. The Ordo will allocate resources to investigate the matter."

traits.locale_text: “我希望，整个科罗努斯扩区只有那艘船上存在这样的异形。但即便真是如此，我也已经把这个情况传达给了审判长。审判庭会分配资源，调查此事。”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: « J'espère que leur présence dans les Étendues se limite à ce vaisseau, mais quoi qu'il en soit, j'ai déjà envoyé un message au seigneur inquisiteur. L'Ordo se chargera d'enquêter sur cette affaire. »
languages.original_text: "I hope their presence in the Expanse is limited to that ship. Even if it is, I have already dispatched a message to the Lord Inquisitor. The Ordo will allocate resources to investigate the matter."

traits.locale_text: « J'espère que leur présence dans les Étendues se limite à ce vaisseau, mais quoi qu'il en soit, j'ai déjà envoyé un message au seigneur inquisiteur. L'Ordo se chargera d'enquêter sur cette affaire. »
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: «Espero que su presencia en la Extensión esté limitada a esa nave. Aunque sea el caso, ya he informado al Lord Inquisidor. Los Ordos asignarán recursos a investigar la situación».
languages.original_text: "I hope their presence in the Expanse is limited to that ship. Even if it is, I have already dispatched a message to the Lord Inquisitor. The Ordo will allocate resources to investigate the matter."

traits.locale_text: «Espero que su presencia en la Extensión esté limitada a esa nave. Aunque sea el caso, ya he informado al Lord Inquisidor. Los Ordos asignarán recursos a investigar la situación».
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: 「エクスパンスにいる奴らはあの船だけだといいのだが。その前提で、すでにロード・インクィジターへの連絡は済ませてある。純血の団は本件の調査にあたるだろう」
languages.original_text: "I hope their presence in the Expanse is limited to that ship. Even if it is, I have already dispatched a message to the Lord Inquisitor. The Ordo will allocate resources to investigate the matter."

traits.locale_text: 「エクスパンスにいる奴らはあの船だけだといいのだが。その前提で、すでにロード・インクィジターへの連絡は済ませてある。純血の団は本件の調査にあたるだろう」
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Ich hoffe, ihre Anwesenheit in der Ausdehnung ist auf dieses Schiff begrenzt. Und selbst wenn dem so ist, ich habe dem Großinquisitor bereits eine Nachricht zukommen lassen. Die Ordos werden Ressourcen bereitstellen, um die Angelegenheit zu untersuchen."
languages.original_text: "I hope their presence in the Expanse is limited to that ship. Even if it is, I have already dispatched a message to the Lord Inquisitor. The Ordo will allocate resources to investigate the matter."

traits.locale_text: "Ich hoffe, ihre Anwesenheit in der Ausdehnung ist auf dieses Schiff begrenzt. Und selbst wenn dem so ist, ich habe dem Großinquisitor bereits eine Nachricht zukommen lassen. Die Ordos werden Ressourcen bereitstellen, um die Angelegenheit zu untersuchen."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.original_text: "I hope their presence in the Expanse is limited to that ship. Even if it is, I have already dispatched a message to the Lord Inquisitor. The Ordo will allocate resources to investigate the matter."

languages.text: "Umarım Enginlik'teki varlıkları o gemiyle sınırlıdır. Her olasılığa karşın Lord Engizisyoncu'ya çoktan mesaj yolladım. Nizam, meseleyi soruşturmak için kaynak tahsis edecektir."
languages.original_text: "I hope their presence in the Expanse is limited to that ship. Even if it is, I have already dispatched a message to the Lord Inquisitor. The Ordo will allocate resources to investigate the matter."
